item.description:
RETURN TO THE MILLTOWN ,HOT ROD N KUSTOM ROCK N ROLL WEEKEND

Rodz, Kustoms, Stockers, Race Cars, Bikes.

18 Bands

Fri night Milltown 2012
5-6 tsunami of sound
615-715 the evil streaks
730-830 johny earthquake
845-945 the nice trys
10-11 unicorn
bettie sue taylor (burlesque)
1130-1230 the arktones
bettie sue taylor (burlesque)
1-2 the skeleton beats

Sat milltownn

12-1 Johny Carlevale and the Juke Joint Rhythm Rockers
115-215 whiskey kill
230-330 preston wayne 4
330-415 awards ect
415-515 the screaming rebel angels
530-630 the ice piks
645-745 the arkhams
8-9 tigeriss
bettie sue taylor burl
930-1030 king sickabilly full moon boys
bettie sue taylor burl
11-12 lolita black
bettie sue taylor burl
1230 – close American speedway….

LowBrow Art gallery

Live Chop From North East Chop Shop

Special Guests

Beer, Food, Vendors

Pre 64 Cut Off

Ok Meetup People. You like Live Music.. Well here is your chance..  18 bands and lots to see..  This is a 2 day event.. So get your rock on!!!!!!
